alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 2:02AM MDT until June 27 at 2:45AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... North central Fall River County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 245 AM MDT. * At 201 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Argyle, or 14 miles north of Edgemont, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Argyle around 215 AM MDT. Pringle around 220 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Wind Cave National Park, Cottonwood Springs Dam, Cold Brook Reservoir, Hot Springs and Maverick Junction. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
